contents.text: Welcome to Armory, your partner for enterprise continuous deployment.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To get pricing, plans, and licensing details, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist for pricing and licensing information.

navigationGoals: Get an enterprise pricing breakdown and licensing options
Find out how much Armory licenses cost so I can plan my veteran-led team’s budget
Get a breakdown of enterprise pricing tiers and license models.
I need someone to explain the cost and licensing options for your enterprise deployment service.
I’d like detailed pricing and licensing information for Armory’s enterprise edition.

contents.text: To schedule a product demo or start a free trial, press 2.
One moment please, we will transfer you to our solutions engineering team for your demo request.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live product demo to evaluate Armory’s CD solution
Arrange a live demo to evaluate how Armory fits my veteran-led startup’s deployment workflow
Schedule a live Armory CD demo and initiate a trial environment.
I’d like to schedule a live demo or start a free trial to see how the product works.
I want to arrange a product demo and start a free trial of your deployment solution.

contents.text: For technical support and developer resources, press 2.
If you need technical support or troubleshooting assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Connect with a support engineer to quickly fix a deployment issue
Get help resolving a Spinnaker deployment failure I’m encountering
Connect with a support engineer to debug my CI/CD pipeline error.
I need help troubleshooting an issue with my deployment software.
I need assistance troubleshooting a deployment issue with your platform.

contents.text: For documentation, community forums, and open source contributions, press 2.
Please hold while we direct you to our developer portal resources.

navigationGoals: Access the developer portal for docs and open-source resources
Access documentation and community forums to learn best practices and contribute to the open source project
Access the developer portal for API docs, community forums, and open-source contributions.
I’m looking for user guides or community resources to learn more about using your software.
I’m looking for documentation and community resources for developer support.
